record.description: Here my friends, we have John P. Mentzer, Class of 1898 and President of the Shanties, placing the initiation robes upon Herbert E. Fleming, Class of 1902 president. The class was duly initiated into the Shanty group on its 20th anniversary as per custom. Fleming responded for the [whole] Class of 1902 with a fine address on Shanty good-fellowship and loyalty.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Piece of right side come off-in mylar. Alumni and UC Magazine stamps. See UC Magazine June, 1922, pp. 287 for caption.
